channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ğŸ†• ADDED Entra role
item.description:
Id: 0ec3f692-38d6-4d14-9e69-0377ca7797ad
Display name: Viva Glint Tenant Administrator
Description: Manage and configure Microsoft Viva Glint settings in the Microsoft 365 admin center.
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/0ec3f692-38d6-4d14-9e69-0377ca7797ad

item.title: ğŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 2bed379c-9fba-455b-99e4-6b911073bcf2
Display name: Compute Fleet Contributor
Description: Allows users to manage Compute Fleet resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/2bed379c-9fba-455b-99e4-6b911073bcf2?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ğŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 1df7cd83-1d3f-41df-95b0-53b30d963369
Display name: Azure API Center Credential Access Reader
Description: Allows for access to Azure API Center data plane get credentials operations.
Link: https://management.azure.com/1df7cd83-1d3f-41df-95b0-53b30d963369?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: âŒ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 4e9b8407-af2e-495b-ae54-bb60a55b1b5a
Display name: Chamber Admin
Description: Lets you manage everything under your Modeling and Simulation Workbench chamber.
Link: https://management.azure.com/4e9b8407-af2e-495b-ae54-bb60a55b1b5a?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: âŒ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 4447db05-44ed-4da3-ae60-6cbece780e32
Display name: Chamber User
Description: Lets you view everything under your Modeling and Simulation Workbench chamber, but not make any changes.
Link: https://management.azure.com/4447db05-44ed-4da3-ae60-6cbece780e32?api-version=2022-04-01
